result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deandre D Anderson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Deandre D Anderson in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
BTC: 

13CF914: 

Ct 1  (RSP) - 6 mos RCJ w/CFTS
Court Costs and DNA surcharge
Pay during probation

Ct  2 (CCW) - RCJ = CFTS conc to Ct 1
Court Costs and DNA surcharge
Pay during probation

14CF963: 

Ct 1  (Poss w/Int) - 3 Yrs WPS - 1 Yr init/2 Yrs ES  I&S - conc to Ct 2
Prob 3 years - conc to Count 2
No alc/cs
AODA assmt and follow-through w/rec's
No cont w/victim and w/co-defendants
Must live w/mother
Seek individual talking therapy/counseling
Any counseling as req'd by Agent
Report to Abundant Life for male mentor
Obtain HS diploma or equivalent
Obtain/maintain employment
Mental health eval and follow-through w/rec's

Ct 2 (BJ) - 4 Yrs WPS - 2 yrs Init/2 Yrs ES - I&S
Prob 3 years
Same cond's as Ct 1 - except costs waived

Defendant is elig for both ERP/CIP
Voting prohibition
Firearm warning

Will not consider any petition for expugment.  
Review hearing scheduled for January 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Deandre D Anderson in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
St - In 13CF914 Plea to Ct 1 as amended to misdm RSP and Plea to Ct 2 as chg'd, DRI Ct 3; In 14CF963 Plea to Cts 1 & 2, DRI Ct 3; and DRI 14CF677
Rights given
P - Guilty 
BTC: Finding of guilt 13CF914 - Ct 1 as amended, and Ct 2 as charged, DRI Ct 3
Finding of guilt 14CF963 - Cts 1 and 2, DRI Ct 3
Dism/RI - 14CF677
PSI ordered
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 10, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Deandre D Anderson in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
Def - Req adj 1 day  Plea hearing scheduled for September 24, 2014 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Jamie McClendon for attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Deandre D Anderson in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.
Trial date remains on 13CF914.
ATN requested from RCSO-jail     Def. ordered to complete P&P while out of custody   12/2/14  No prints and photos to this date

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter, Katie Giebel.
Def - Req ELM removed, also req release for job search - 4-6 hrs per week
BTC: Defendant allowed to attend school and work, curfew 8pm unless working. 
  Jury trial scheduled for September 23, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on May 29, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee. Defendant told to go get prints and photos done.  Status conference scheduled for May 29, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint.   House arrest - may leave home for court, medical emergencies and attorney appointments only.  Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780). Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons. No contact with victims or co-defendants.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers. The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance. The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Deandre D Anderson in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.
Def - Waive reading, req prelim
St - Req cash bond
BTC: Bond set at $5,000 sig bond - same cond's as 13CF914. 
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.
